items.title: Introduction to ROS 2 as a Robotic Nervous System
items.description: Understanding why robots need a nervous system and the fundamental concepts of ROS 2

items.title: Module 1 Summary: ROS 2 - Robotic Nervous System
items.description: Summary of ROS 2 concepts and implementation for humanoid robotics

items.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics: Bridging Digital and Physical Intelligence
items.description: A comprehensive technical book on building AI systems for humanoid robots, covering ROS 2, simulation, NVIDIA Isaac, and Vision-Language-Action systems.
